clinical_study.brief_title: Database of Patients Treated With Respiratory Support
clinical_study.official_title: Observatoire de l'ANTADIR - Database of Patients Registered as Treated With Respiratory Support in a Multicenter Homecare Federation for Patients Wirh Respiratory Problems

lead_sponsor.agency: Association Nationale pour les Traitements A Domicile, les Innovations et la Recherche

clinical_study.source: Association Nationale pour les Traitements A Domicile, les Innovations et la Recherche

brief_summary.textblock: An observatory of patients registered in 22 local homecare associations in France, for respiratory diseases, with annual data update. Demographic and clinical data are registered rendering possible extraction of clinical and prognostic data.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients on treatment for respiratory failure and for sleep apnoea are registered on entry into treatment with recording of clincal and demographic data. Data available on age, sex, region, respiratoy function, blood gases, smoking status and some bilogical data

primary_outcome.description: long term follow up of a regularly updated database

secondary_outcome.description: Change of treatment from oxygen to ventilatioion or other evolution

arm_group.description: database of patients on ventilatory support

intervention.description: oxygen therapy, ventilation for respiratory failure CPAP for sleep apnoea

study_pop.textblock: Patients requiring respiratory support, in the ANTADIR homecare federation

overall_official.affiliation: Association Nationale pour les Traitements A Domicile, les Innovations et la Recherche
